name: count_records
description: Count the number of records in a database table with optional WHERE and GROUP BY clauses.

table_name.description: The name of the table to query.

where_clause.description: A WHERE clause to filter the records, without the 'WHERE' keyword. Optional.

where_params.description: A list or tuple of parameters for the WHERE clause. Optional.

oneOf.description: A single column name for the GROUP BY clause.
A list of column names for the GROUP BY clause.

group_by.description: A column name or a list of columns for the GROUP BY clause. Optional.
